subject: Stadiums and Arenas
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Quinnipiac University's $52 million TD Banknorth Sports Center has two arenas, one with 3,200 seats for hockey and another with 3,500 seats for basketball.
snippet: Quinnipiac University's $52 million TD Banknorth Sports Center has two arenas, one with 3,200 seats for hockey and another with 3,500 seats for basketball.
